qna.a: You know what, Dan Zadra has said that worry is a misuse of the imagination. We are always with you. If it is career related, you might want to contact Career and Attachment office. You could either email them at cao@ntu.edu.sg, or make a call at 67905242.

q: I lose my hope about my future, what should I do
I am hopeless about my future, please help me
